attributes.action: OpCapita MUST be investigated for the demise of Comet
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to ask for ministers to investigate the way Comet has been run since its purchase In February this year.

Only a few weeks before Comet went into administration, the company was showing signs of actually doing well as a business but OpCapita still brought in the administrators???

There was a deal at the time of sale of 18 months guaranteed business but only half of that has been upheld.

Not enough stock had been bought for Comet to sell so not enough money has been invested.

We've just been stripped down to make a profit.
